|lan_ports = 5 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = CompexWRT;;; |exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 3.0, SIM |exp_sim_num = 2 |exp_minipcie_num = 3 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = 35-56 |pwr_poe_amp = |pwr_conn = |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes |jtag = yes |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = OpenWrt |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 02/2016 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Even though 802.11ac is in the title off this device, there is no indication that radios are installed or embedded in this device. ===Product highlights=== *[[Qualcomm]] IPQ8064 ARM @1.4GHz CPU *512MB DDR3 System Memory *256MB NAND Flash *32MB NOR Flash *2x Mini PCIe slot with PCIe 2.0 *1x Mini PCIe slot with PCIe 2.0 and USB 2.0 *5x GbE LAN RJ45 with Auto-MDI/X *1x USB 3.0 port *2x SIM holder / 1x Console port *Integrated 48-56V 802.3at PoE ===Applications=== *Optimized for 4x4 MU-MIMO 802.11ac module support *Tri-Band MU-MIMO 802.11abgn/ac Access Point *Dual Concurrent MU-MIMO 802.11an/ac Access Point *Wireless Base Station *3G/LTE AP ===Ordering Configuration=== 
Item Code		        Chipset	         Board Information
WPQ864HV 6A02PR32F1GBR-3S       IPQ8064          CPU board with 3 MiniPCIe slot
